alert.note: Alert for Dutchess; Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 11:20PM EST until January 10 at 4:10PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hudson River near Poughkeepsie. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 4.2 feet, Minor flood stage. Minor flooding of lowlands, boat docks and boat launches. Water covers State Route 213 in Eddyville. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 4.3 feet. - Forecast...The river will crest at 4.6 feet around midnight and fall below flood stage after 2 am. A second rise over flood stage to 5 feet is expected Wednesday by late in the morning. - Flood stage is 4.2 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hudson River Poughkeepsie Flood Stage: 4.2 Observed Stage at Tue 10 pm: 4.3 Forecast: Wed 5 am 3.2 Wed 11 am 5.0 Wed 5 pm -0.2 Wed 11 pm 0.0 Thu 5 am -2.2 Thu 11 am 2.8 Thu 5 pm 0.5 Thu 11 pm 0.9 Fri 5 am -1.7 Fri 11 am 1.9 Fri 5 pm 0.8 &&
